title: What's new in Swift 4 [playground]
author: mmariani
content: readme.md s in swift 4 xcode playground showcasing new features swift 4.0. seen the s in swift session wwdc 2017.written ole begemann, may 2017. playground requires swift 4. xcode 9 includes swift 4 default (download xcode 9 beta developer.apple.com). can run in xcode 8.3, you need install latest swift 4.0 snapshot swift.org (dont worry, s easy).
